description: Canmet MATÉRIAUX, a branch of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) intends to procure an X-Ray Diffractometer (XRD) for research and development purposes.
full_summary:
# Annex: Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Details
### Title/Name
- English: 23584-230167 Autonomous X-Ray Diffractometer (XRD)
- French: 23584-230167 Diffractomètre à rayons X (DRX)

### Reference Number
WS3677624794-Doc3679914124

### Publication Date
October 27, 2022

### Tender Closing Date and Time
December 2, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST

### Solicitation Number
WS3677624794

### Contracting Entity
- Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Notice URL
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14484346?extsite=MTQ0ODQzNDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Description
Canmet Materials, a branch of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan), intends to procure an X-Ray Diffractometer (XRD) for research and development purposes. The purchased equipment will be used to analyze solid conductive metallic samples.

## Tender Requirements
- Category: Goods (GD)
- Method of Procurement: Competitive - Open bidding
- Trade Agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Additional Information

### Regions of Opportunity
None

### Regions of Delivery
- Hamilton

### End-User Entities
- Name: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
- Address: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4, Canada

### Points of Contact
- Name: Darlene Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: [darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Phone: Not provided
- Fax: Not provided
- Address: Not provided
